mapper.insert: insert into member (name, user_id, user_pw, gender, email, address, post, phone, birth, profile) values( #{name}, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{post, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
